data.title: Data and statistics
data.meta_description: SMHI has access to a comprehensive database with a long series of day-to-day observations from weather stations throughout the world. From the database, weather statistics are customised based on your requirements and needs for the best possibl...
data.text:
- A wind rose gives you an idea of the prevailing wind directions and wind speeds

SMHI can provide an analytical report with wind roses describing the wind conditions at any of our many monitoring sites around Sweden.

- Extreme weather analysis is often used to withstand hard weather for a long period of time

SMHI can provide probability estimates and return periods to be used when analyzing observed weather events or when dimensioning sensitive equipment, infrastructure or buildings.
